name: Prehistoric Gal
description:
Play as Gal, a beautiful blue-haired prehistoric girl, and save her beloved, Dude, a kind, ham-loving caveman who was abducted by aliens!

Dude is a cool prehistoric guy who loves ham more than anything, well, he did, since one day he meets Gal, a cave girl so sweet and so beautiful that he falls in love at first sight and who makes ham become Dude's second favorite thing in life.

With the help of your dinosaur friends, travel through prehistory in search of the ships of the evil aliens who kidnapped your loved one! The path will be full of challenges and enemies, but Gal is a tough girl and will face whatever comes her way to save her favorite ham eater!

FEATURES
- Visit four prehistoric themed scenarios;
- Colorful 8-bit style graphics;
- Many helpful Items to find;
- Simplified leveling system;
- Ride some dinos;
- Alternative paths.
